languages.text: "Жду предложений, как ты исправишь свои промахи".

traits.locale_text: "Ты и впрямь не слишком добросовестна в своем служении мне".

languages.text: "I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."
languages.original_text: "Жду предложений, как ты исправишь свои промахи".

traits.locale_text: "I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."
"I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."
"I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."
"I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."
"I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."
"I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."

languages.text: "Ich warte darauf, zu hören, wie Ihr Eure Fehler wiedergutmachen wollt."
languages.original_text: "I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."

traits.locale_text: "Ich warte darauf, zu hören, wie Ihr Eure Fehler wiedergutmachen wollt."

languages.text: «Estoy esperando a que explique cómo pretende enmendar sus errores».
languages.original_text: "I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy esperando a que explique cómo pretende enmendar sus errores».

languages.text: 「自分の日をどう挽回しようとしているのか、聞かせてもらいたい」
languages.original_text: "I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の日をどう挽回しようとしているのか、聞かせてもらいたい」

languages.text: “我想听听你打算如何弥补你的过错。”
languages.original_text: "I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."

traits.locale_text: “我想听听你打算如何弥补你的过错。”

languages.text: « J'attends toujours de savoir comment vous comptez vous racheter. »
languages.original_text: "I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."

traits.locale_text: « J'attends toujours de savoir comment vous comptez vous racheter. »

languages.text: "Hatalarını nasıl telafi etmeyi planladığını duymayı bekliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am waiting to hear how you intend to redeem your faults."
